summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GuessIt football prediction platform clone - all major features working correctly with real Football-Data.org API integration

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: WebSocket connection sometimes fails to establish
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Graceful fallback to 60-second auto-refresh working correctly

passed_tests: Homepage loads with GUESSIT header, promo banner, match tabs, league filters, and match cards
Backend API /api/football/matches returns 113 real matches from Football-Data.org
League filter buttons work (All Matches, Live, UCL, Premier League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Ligue 1)
Grid/List view toggle works on main page
Login page loads at /login route with proper form validation
Register page loads at /register route with password requirements
Search functionality works - displays results for team searches
Backend auth endpoints working: POST /api/auth/register, POST /api/auth/login, GET /api/auth/me
Backend predictions endpoints working: POST /api/predictions, GET /api/predictions/me
My Predictions page loads at /predictions route (protected)
Full authentication flow: register → nickname selection → protected pages
Protected route security working (redirects to login when not authenticated)
Real match data integration from Football-Data.org API key
Backend serves 113 matches across multiple competitions
All football API endpoints working correctly
